entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.2°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -36.5°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
